data.title: best gallery in oakland metro detroit
data.text: I stumbled upon this jewel when walking through Pontiac a couple of weeks ago. Across from Bo's, it is only a couple of minutes from Birmingham up Woodward from Bloomfield. I say the poster for the Grand Opening on the 21st of November and went. Great Art ! and the Belgian chocolates as amuses bouches were wonderful. The gallery really has that belgo-french feel, yet the American Artist Rebecca gray smith shows the big American city of Chicago in all it's glory. Stop by - it has weekend hours and weekday ones. I am going back to buy chocolate as christmas gifts myselfrodger coltrain
